title: Ducktales Collection (English & Dutch audio)
description:
TITLE: Ducktales Collection (English & Dutch audio)

Be patient for me to upload the whole collection. It will take me awhile, so please help seed. 


Notes on this release:

1. I changed the episode order of the different volumes into the order of appareance on US TV. Episodes 76 - 100 haven't been officially released! This torrent contains season 1 & 2.


2. Sixteen epsiodes from season 1 & 2 haven't been officially released with dutch audio. I've found thirteen dutch audio streams from different sources on the internet. I've tried to sync these as good as possible with the original video release from the DVD collections. But remember audio maybe (a litte) out of sync and quality may be less.


3. I couldn't find any dutch audio for the following (three) episodes; 18 Dinosaur Ducks, 19 Hero for Hire, 30 Home Sweet Homer


4. No Subs (I find that English & Dutch language is sufficient)



Enjoy flojisan!



Format........: Matroska (MKV)
Sources.......: Collection Region 2, Collection Region 1, various lossy internet sources for dutch audio stream

Stream 0 (video)
Codec.........: MPEG-1/2 (mpgv)
Resolution....: 720 x 576
Frame rate....: 25 fps
Video bitrate.: ~8-9 MBps

Stream 1 
Codec.........: A52 Audio (aka AC3) (a52)
Language......: English
Channels......: Stereo
Sample rate...: 48000 Hz
Bitrate.......: 192 kb/s

Stream 1

Language......: Dutch
